page.title: 06SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: IN SUCH A RURAL AREA IT IS NOT SURPRISING THAT THE{MOST POPULAR HOBBY IS{GARDENING.}THIS CAN BE ANYTHING FROM TENDING A SMALL LAWN AND VEGETABLE PATCH TO CARING FOR AN ACRE OR MORE OF LAND.{READING}WAS ANOTHER VERY POPULAR PASTIME. A{MOBILE LIBRARY {VISITS THE AREA AND A COUNTY LIBRARY {IS SITUATED AT CALLINGTON. SPORT}IS PURSUED BY A GOOD NUMBER OF PEOPLE WITH TEAM GAMES SUCH AS{SOCCER AND {CRICKET}WELL TO THE FORE. LESS ENERGETIC GAMES SUCH AS{DARTS AND {SNOOKER}HELPED TO PLACE{SPORT THIRD}IN THE ORDER OF HOBBIES.{D.I.Y. OR HOME {IMPROVEMENT}TAKE UP A GOOD AMOUNT OF RECREATION TIME. WITH SO MANY{BARN {CONVERSIONS}AND OLD COTTAGES IN THE AREA IT IS NOT SURPRISING THAT IT FEATURES FOURTH IN THE LIST. THE FINAL MAJOR RECREATION WAS{CRAFT}WITH {PAINTING AND POTTERY}PROVING POPULAR.
